title: Right... from the start
creator_credit: John Julian, Queen Victoria Medical Centre and University of Melbourne
brief_description: This videotape is basically for training midwives and medical students and is about the principles of breastfeeding. Mothers are often subject to conflicting views and information about breastfeeding and this video tackles the problem.
creator_credit_for_label: John Julian, Queen Victoria Medical Centre and University of Melbourne
